mapper.select: SELECT orderNum FROM order_bundle ORDER BY order_date DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_bundle (orderNum, userId, order_date, addr1, addr2, tel, memo, total_price, restaurantNum) VALUES (#{orderNum}, #{userId}, SYSDATE, #{addr1}, #{addr2}, #{tel}, #{memo}, #{total_price}, #{restaurantNum})
INSERT INTO order_item (orderitemNum, orderNum, menuNum, orderCount, menuPrice, optionName) VALUES (order_item_seq.NEXTVAL, #{orderNum}, #{menuNum}, #{orderCount}, #{menuPrice}, #{optionName})
INSERT INTO order_status (statusNum, orderNum, statusName, field, memo) VALUES (order_status_seq.NEXTVAL, #{orderNum}, 1, SYSDATE, null)
INSERT INTO payment (payNum, orderNum, pay_date, payMethod, price, couponNum, state) VALUES (payment_seq.NEXTVAL, #{orderNum}, SYSDATE, #{payMethod}, #{price}, #{couponNum, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 1)
